text: François Bouchard (born August 8, 1973) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey player. In 2001 he was Swedish ice hockey champion with Djurgårdens IF and in 2004 he was German ice hockey champion with Frankfurt Lions. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Djurgårdens IF Hockey players Category:HPK players Category:Oulun Kärpät players Category:Modo Hockey players Category:ERC Ingolstadt players Category:Vienna Capitals players Category:Adler Mannheim players Category:Frankfurt Lions players Category:Augsburger Panther players Category:St. John's Maple Leafs players Category:Charlotte Checkers (1993–2010) players Category:Northeastern Huskies men's ice hockey players Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Canadian expatriate ice hockey players in Germany Category:Canadian expatriate ice hockey players in Sweden
title: François Bouchard (ice hockey, born 1973)
